# roxywi Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    roxywi = {
      source = "Roxy-wi/roxywi"
    }
  }
}

provider "roxywi" {
  base_url = "https://..."
  login    = "test"
  password = "testpass"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `login` (String) Username for Roxy-WI.
- `password` (String) Password for Roxy-WI.

### Optional

- `base_url` (String) URL to connect for Roxy-WI.
